wairþs ist, þammei fragibis þata;
LUKE 7.5 unte frijoþ þiuda unsara, jah swnagogein is gatimrida unsis.
LUKE 7.6 iþ Iesus iddjuh miþ im.
jah juþan ni fairra wisandin imma þamma garda, insandida du imma sa hundafads frijonds, qiþands du imma:
frauja, ni draibei þuk, unte ni im wairþs ei uf hrot mein inngaggais.
LUKE 7.7 duþei ni mik silban wairþana rahnida at þus qiman;
ak qiþ waurda, jah gahailnid sa þiumagus meins.
LUKE 7.8 jah þan auk ik manna im uf waldufnja gasatids, habands uf mis silbin gadrauhtins;
jah qiþa du þamma: gagg, jah gaggid;
jah anþaramma: qim her, jah qimid;
jah du skalka meinamma: tawei þata, jah taujid.
LUKE 7.9 gahausjands þan þata Iesus sildaleikida ina jah wandjands sik du þizai afarlaistjandein sis managein qaþ:
amen, qiþa izwis,
ni in Israela swalauda galaubein bigat.
LUKE 7.10 jah gawandjandans sik þai insandidans du garda bigetun þana siukan skalk hailana.
LUKE 7.11 jah warþ in þamma afardaga, iddja in baurg namnida Naem;
jah mididdjedun imma siponjos is ganohai jah manageins filu.
LUKE 7.12 biþeh þan neƕa was daura þizos baurgs, þaruh sai, utbaurans was naus, sunus ainaha aiþein seinai, jah si silbo widowo, jah managei þizos baurgs ganoha miþ izai.
LUKE 7.13 jah gasaiƕands þo frauja infeinoda du izai jah qaþ du izai:
ni gret!
LUKE 7.14 jah duatgaggands attaitok ƕilftrjom;
iþ þai bairandans gastoþun;
jah qaþ:
juggalaud, du þus qiþa:
urreis!
LUKE 7.15 jah ussat sa naus jah dugann rodjan.
jah atgaf ina aiþein is.
LUKE 7.16 dissat þan allans agis, jah mikilidedun guþ, qiþandans þatei praufetus mikils urrais in unsis, jah þatei gaweisoda guþ manageins seinaizos.
LUKE 7.17 jah usiddja þata waurd and alla Iudaia bi ina jah and allans bisitands.
LUKE 7.18 jah gataihun Iohannen siponjos is bi alla þo.
LUKE 7.19 jah athaitands twans siponje seinaize Iohannes insandida ins du Iesua qiþands:
þu u is sa qimanda þau anþaranu wenjaima?
LUKE 7.20 qimandans þan at imma þai wairos qeþun:
Iohannes sa daupjands insandida ugkis du þus, qiþands:
þu u is sa qimanda þau anþaranu wenjaima?
LUKE 7.21 inuh þan þizai ƕeilai gahailida managans af sauhtim jah slahim jah ahmane ubilaize jah blindaim managaim fragaf siun.
LUKE 7.22 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
gaggandans gateihats Iohannen þatei gaseƕuts jah gahausideduts, þatei blindai ussaiƕand, haltai gaggand, þrutsfillai gahrainjanda, baudai gahausjand, naweis urreisand, unledai wailamerjanda;
LUKE 7.23 jah audags ist saƕazuh saei ni gamarzjada in mis.
LUKE 7.24 at galeiþandam þan þaim airum Iohannes dugann rodjan du manageim bi Iohannen:
ƕa usiddjeduþ in auþida saiƕan?
raus fram winda wagid?
LUKE 7.25 akei ƕa usiddjeduþ saiƕan?
mannan in hnasqjaim wastjom gawasidana?
sai, þai in wastjom wulþagaim jah fodeinai wisandans in þiudangardjom sind.
LUKE 7.26 akei ƕa usiddjeduþ saiƕan?
praufetu?
jai, qiþa izwis,
jah mais praufetu.
LUKE 7.27 sa ist, bi þanei gamelid ist:
sai, ik insandja aggilu meinana faura andwairþja þeinamma, saei gamanweid wig þeinana faura þus.
LUKE 7.28 qiþa allis izwis,
maiza in baurim qinono praufetus Iohanne þamma daupjandin ainshun nist;
iþ sa minniza in þiudangardjai gudis maiza imma ist.
LUKE 7.29 jah alla managei gahausjandei jah motarjos garaihtana domidedun guþ, ufdaupidai daupeinai Iohannis.
LUKE 7.30 iþ Fareisaieis jah witodafastjos runa gudis fraqeþun ana sik, ni daupidai fram imma.
LUKE 7.31 ƕe nu galeiko þans mans þis kunjis, jah ƕe sijaina galeikai?
LUKE 7.32 galeikai sind barnam þaim in garunsai sitandam jah wopjandam seina misso jah qiþandam:
swiglodedum izwis jah ni plinsideduþ,
gaunodedum izwis janni gaigrotuþ.
LUKE 7.33 urrann raihtis Iohannes sa daupjands, nih hlaif matjands nih wein drigkands, jah qiþiþ:
